description: This file defines interfaces for controlling and managing various system components within the WPEFramework plugin architecture. It includes interface declarations for system management, discovery, configuration, lifecycle management, and metadata, with external dependencies on other core and plugin headers.

classes.name: ISystemManagement
classes.description: Interface for system management functions such as rebooting, deleting paths, cloning plugins, and environment retrieval.

classes.name: IDiscovery
classes.description: Interface for network discovery operations like starting discovery and retrieving discovery results.

classes.name: IConfiguration
classes.description: Interface for handling plugin configuration persistence and retrieval.

classes.name: ILifeTime
classes.description: Interface for managing plugin lifecycle events, including activation, deactivation, and notifications.

classes.name: IMetadata
classes.description: Interface for retrieving metadata about running proxies, statuses, links, process info, subsystems, version, and callstack.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Reboots the device.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes contents of a directory from persistent storage.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a plugin with a new callsign.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified environment variable.

methods.name: StartDiscovery
methods.description: Initiates SSDP network discovery with a specified TTL.

methods.name: DiscoveryResults
methods.description: Provides SSDP network discovery results.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Stores the configuration to persistent memory.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets configuration values for a plugin identified by callsign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a sink for lifetime notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered sink.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates a plugin by its callsign.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates a plugin by its callsign.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks a plugin as unavailable for interaction.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Sets a plugin to Hibernate state with a timeout.

methods.name: Suspend
methods.description: Suspends a plugin.

methods.name: Resume
methods.description: Resumes a suspended plugin.

methods.name: Proxies
methods.description: Provides details of currently running proxies.

methods.name: Status
methods.description: Provides status and configuration details of a plugin.

methods.name: Links
methods.description: Provides details of active connections.

methods.name: ProcessInfo
methods.description: Provides framework process information.

methods.name: Subsystems
methods.description: Provides details of active subsystems.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Provides the version info of WPEFramework.

methods.name: CallStack
methods.description: Retrieves callstack information for a thread index.

ctags.name: IConfiguration
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IConfiguration : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDiscovery
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IDiscovery : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ILifeTime
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ILifeTime : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IMetadata
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IMetadata : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ISystemManagement
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ISystemManagement : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
